item.title: Farmer Selling & Devaluation
item.dc:creator: Pablo Figueroa
item.description: Macro in ARG is very relevant at this stage when beyond fundamentals being very negative, we have no resources to extend the life cycle (before it was huge central bank reserves, public money available and then it was a change in government). Now is just another 3 more years of a populist government with no resources left.

item.title: Welcome to My Blog
item.dc:creator: Nora Jones
item.description: Welcome to our new blog, My Blog. We hope you enjoy reading what we have to say!

item.title: Record Farmer Selling!
item.dc:creator: Pablo Figueroa
item.description: For someone outside Argentina that looks at prices and economics for new crop, it would not be surprising to find that farmers have already sold most of their crops. While it´s the case in countries such as Brazil and Paraguay, Argentina is the exception. Farmers dont seem to be responding to such incentives. Why? This is what we try to explain in this article.

item.title: La Niña is comming
item.dc:creator: Pablo Figueroa
item.description: No news that a La Niña cicle has stablished and that it will last during the south hemisfere summer. While it´s known that yields tend to be below average, some questions arise: | * What can we expect based on recent history? * Which regions will suffer the most?
